Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Activities IG Idea Generation DD Design Draft TFC Technical Feasibility Check CE Cost Evaluation PC Prototype Creation LT Laboratory Testing UT User Testing AG Approval Gate MP Marketing Plan FL Final Launch Process flow logical IG must happen existence typically starts the process init DD follows IG TFC and CE can happen after DD maybe in parallel or sequence PC after design is feasible and costs evaluated LT and UT testing phases after prototype AG approval after testing MP after approval marketing prep FL final step must happen at end

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Unary constraints existence All activities should probably exist in the log at some point or at least the main ones absence Not sure if any activities should be absent exactly one Maybe AG Approval Gate happens exactly once Or FL Or IG init IG Idea Generation should start the process

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Binary constraints responded existence If A happens B must happen somewhere If IG happens FL must happen If DD happens PC should happen If PC happens LT and UT should happen coexistence A and B happen together if A happens B happens and vice versa TFC and CE might coexist LT and UT might coexist response If A happens B must happen after A IG DD DD TFC DD CE TFC PC CE PC PC LT PC UT LT AG UT AG AG MP MP FL precedence B can only happen if A happened before DD preceded by IG TFC preceded by DD CE preceded by DD PC preceded by TFC and CE LT preceded by PC UT preceded by PC AG preceded by LT and UT MP preceded by AG FL preceded by MP succession Both response and precedence IG DD DD TFC CE PC LT UT AG MP FL

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: looking at the format specification again For the keys unary the value is a dictionary containing as keys the activities and as corresponding value the support 10 and confidence of the declarative rule For binary keys the value is a dictionary containing as keys the activities and as corresponding value the support 10 and confidence Actually looking at standard pm4py DECLARE format Typically for binary constraints the key is a tuple activity a activity b So yes for binary constraints the keys should be tuples of two activities

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Let me structure the model 1 init Process must start with IG IG support 10 confidence 10 2 existence Key activities must occur IG DD FL Maybe all main activities or at least start middle end 3 exactly one Activities that happen exactly once per case AG FL Approval and Launch are typically once per product 4 absence Activities that should not happen empty 5 responded existence If A happens B must happen somewhere IG FL DD PC PC LT PC UT 6 coexistence If A happens B happens and vice versa TFC CE LT UT 7 response If A happens B must happen after A IG DD DD TFC DD CE TFC PC CE PC PC LT PC UT LT AG UT AG AG MP MP FL 8 precedence B can only happen if A happened before similar pairs to response

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: to avoid redundancy use succession for the main linear flow IG DD PC AG MP FL coexistence for parallel activities TFC CE LT UT response for dependencies where order matters but maybe not strict But if use succession for IG DD dont need response or precedence for that pair Let me organize Linear flow IG DD TFC CE PC LT UT AG MP FL Constraints init IG existence IG FL maybe all others exactly one AG FL IG succession IG DD AG MP MP FL coexistence TFC CE LT UT response DD TFC DD CE PC LT PC UT LT AG UT AG

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - IND
Text: to make it clean and realistic use succession for the main linear backbone IG DD PC AG MP FL coexistence for parallel mandatory activities TFC CE LT UT response for the detailed dependencies that branch merge precedence for the detailed constraints exactly one for milestones init for start using both succession and response precedence for the same pair is redundant distribute them Use succession for IG DD AG MP MP FL Use response for DD TFC DD CE TFC PC CE PC PC LT PC UT LT AG UT AG Use precedence for TFC PC CE PC to ensure PC has both prerequisites

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: to show variety and avoid empty sections populate some of the alt and chain variants with realistic constraints chainresponse AG MP immediate succession altresponse PC AG prototype to approval without another prototype in between nonsuccession FL IG FL DD no going back after launch or approval Final check on the output format It should be a Python dictionary literal that can be copied and used
